comment.text: This translation key is used for the label "RequestPostBody" which appears as a heading in a UI component. It indicates that the content below it is related to the body of a POST request.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'نص طلب POST' while understandable, doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'POST request body'. A more accurate translation would emphasize that it's the *content* of the POST request.

While 'Текст на POST заявка' is understandable, a more accurate and common translation for 'POST request body' would be 'Съдържание на POST заявка'. 'Текст' (text) implies textual content, while 'Съдържание' (content) is a more encompassing term for the body of a request, which could include JSON or other data formats.

While technically correct, "Σώμα αίτησης POST" is not the most natural-sounding translation. 'Σώμα' can feel a bit formal and literal here. A more common and understandable phrasing would be 'Δεδομένα POST αίτησης' or 'Περιεχόμενο POST αίτησης'.

The translation 'POST հարցման մարմին' is a literal translation but might not be the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'POST request body' in Armenian. A more common term might be used depending on the technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'POST թողոնի բովվածք' or 'POST հարցման բովվածք', which might be more familiar to Armenian speakers in a technical setting.  Further context would help determine the best option.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ເນື້ອໃນການຮ້ອງຂໍ POST' is a literal translation and might not be the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'POST request body' in Lao. It's understandable but could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'ເນື້ອໃນຕົວຢ່າງການສົ່ງຂໍ້ຄວາມ POST' or 'ເນື້ອໃນຂອງການສົ່ງຂໍ້ມູນ POST' depending on the specific context.  A more concise option could be 'ເນື້ອໃນ POST' if it's clear from context that it's a request body.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'POST pieprasījuma pamatteksts' is technically correct but could be more natural and concise in Latvian. 'Pamatteksts' (body) feels a bit formal and less common in this context.

The translation "POST-aanvraagtekst" is not the most natural or idiomatic Dutch translation for "POST request body". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more common and understandable translation would be "Request body voor POST-verzoeken" or "POST verzoek body".

The translation "POST ඉල්ලීමේ අන්තර්ගතය" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "POST request body". While technically correct, it sounds somewhat formal and less idiomatic. A more natural translation would incorporate the concept of 'request' more seamlessly.
The translation 'POST telo zahteve' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'POST request body' in Slovenian. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat literal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and idiomatic translation would be 'telo zahtevka' or 'telo POST zahteve'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Тело POST захтева' is not the most accurate or natural-sounding Serbian (Cyrillic) translation of 'POST request body'. 'Захтева' is the genitive singular of 'захтев' (request), but the construction feels awkward.  A better translation would incorporate a more standard phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тело POST захтева (или Тело захтева за POST)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Using 'захтева' is grammatically sound, but stylistically it would be more fluent to use 'за POST захтева' or 'тело захтева за POST'.

The Serbian translation 'Telo POST zahteva' is not an accurate translation of 'POST request body'. 'Telo' means 'body' in a more general sense and doesn't specifically refer to the request body in a technical context. It also sounds unnatural.
While 'Teksto POST zahteva' is better, the case usage is incorrect. Serbian nouns have grammatical cases. In this context, the noun 'tekst' (text) should likely be in the genitive case.

The translation 'Тіло запиту POST' is a literal translation and might not be the most natural or accurate way to convey 'POST request body' in Ukrainian. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Тіло POST-запиту' or 'POST-тіло запиту'. The best option would depend on the specific context and desired level of formality.
